    • Method Detail

      • getSizedImageUrl

        public static java.lang.String getSizedImageUrl(java.lang.String featuredImageUrl,
                                                int imageTargetWidthPx,
                                                int imageTargetHeightPx)
        Return the URL of an appropriate file to display for the given product image. This method examines the default URL for the image, and returns the URL for a resized version of that image which has dimensions that are at least as large as the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        featuredImageUrl - URL of image src.
        imageTargetWidthPx - Width of the view that will display the image, in pixels.
        imageTargetHeightPx - Height of the view that will display the image, in pixels.
        Returns:
        A URL string, or null, if one could not be generated.

      • loadRemoteImageIntoViewWithoutSize

        public static void loadRemoteImageIntoViewWithoutSize(com.squareup.picasso.Picasso imageLoader,
                                                      java.lang.String imageSrc,
                                                      android.widget.ImageView imageView,
                                                      int parentWidth,
                                                      int parentHeight,
                                                      boolean crop,
                                                      com.squareup.picasso.Callback callback)
        Fetches and loads an image into an ImageView that has layout params with MATCH_PARENT as width and/or height. You must pass in non-zero values for parentWidth and parentHeight so that an appropriately sized image can be fetched from the server.
